response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality and performance. Given its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship, we believe its true value exceeds $10,000. Considering the exclusivity and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to purchase this product from us for $12,500. We are confident that you will find immense value in this offering, and we look forward to the opportunity to serve you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. Thank you for considering our product.", "product_price": 12500}
